About this site

This page is used to preview how changes in .yml, .css and .scss files affect my blog posts.

This page is meant to be accessed only when you are rendering this Quarto website locally. If you are accessing this page on my live website, you can report it as an issue in this link1.

1 Otherwise, this can be a secret online page.

Images

Code

Inline

R Code below

Block

library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)

data <-
  penguins |>
  mutate(
    bill_ratio = bill_depth_mm / bill_length_mm,
    bill_area  = bill_depth_mm * bill_length_mm
  )

which_penguin <- function(data, penguin) {
  data |> filter(species == penguin)
}

which_penguin(data, "Adelie")
1
Take penguins, and then,
2
add new columns for the bill ratio and bill area.

Note

Note that there are five types of callouts, including: note, tip, warning, caution, and important.

Tip

TipTitle

This callout has a title.

Warning
WarningDo not open!

I’ve warned you!

Note that there are five types of callouts, including: note, tip, warning, caution, and important.

Note that there are five types of callouts, including: note, tip, warning, caution, and important.
